data.text: @Hope2bfree Thank you, I actually read up on it. I am seeing a dermatologist tomorrow, even if it's just to confirm the diagnosis to set my mind at ease.

@MrsRuiters Don't worry, it will pass. I was really worried too after C19. Washing my hair was a nightmare, thought I was going bald. After about 3 months it finally stopped. It is a condition called Telogen Effluvium and it can be caused by other reasons too, lasting from 6 to 9mo
@purpledragonlil Thank you and sorry to hear you are suffering. Physically I am fine outside of the fatigue, but getting better daily ❤

@MrsRuiters I'm so sorry. I'm in the same boat as you so I feel your pain ❤ going to the doc is the best thing to do. I eventually went to a physician this week because I couldn't take being ill anymore. Hope you feel better soon ❤
@Snoble19 Thank you. At this stage willing to try anything ❤
@MrsRuiters I’ve seen ppl use a placenta and aloe mask on their hair. Maybe that helps? Because they swear by it.
@Rushtush Poor Ramzi 💙 hope he is ok
@soyLameez Thank you. I feel less alone knowing there are others that have been through this ❤
@MrsRuiters So sorry about this. I also lost ALOT of my hair after Covid. But it comes back after a few months. Just hang in there ❤️❤️
